description:
Braydon is a hot military boy just looking for some fun.
He's all about the girls, but I think he might be interested in experimenting with a dude.
His solo video is extra fun since he clearly likes showing off, and he's one of those guys that tempts you to come suck his dick.
Pretty sure he will come back and "play around" with a dude, so stay tuned for more of Braydon.
title: Braydon - Solo
